hero.description: “Carpathian Herbs” is a Ukrainian brand of natural health and beauty products made from wild Carpathian plants. Full production cycle. Personalized product selection.

text_block.paragraph_1: Leadership is the power that can bring all the pieces together into one whole. Only a true leader can build a strong business. » (R. Kiyosaki)
text_block.paragraph_2: The Ukrainian brand “Roslyna Karpat” is a powerful manufacturer of eco-friendly, natural products made from raw natural materials for health and beauty with years of experience. The production has long had a closed cycle – from harvesting raw materials in the highlands of the wild Carpathians, preparing medicinal plant collections, to packaging the products.

stats.item1: Our products are in demand both in pharmacies and online — total sales keep growing.
stats.item2: Effectiveness confirmed — figures based on observations and reviews.
stats.item3: Level of trust in our products.

reviews.subtitle: What our users say:
reviews.description: Here people share their impressions and experience using the product.

items.author: Dmytro Lytvynov
items.text: The price and quality match perfectly. I didn’t expect this effect, pleasantly surprised, I recommend it.

items.author: Olha Ostapenko
items.text: The product worked better than expected. Will order again!

items.author: Illia Drobnyi
items.text: Really effective. Everything arrived quickly, nicely packaged.
